# `BuShortTermForecastingSettings` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| defaultHistoryWeeks | `number` | No | The number of historical weeks to consider when creating a forecast. This setting is only used for legacy weighted average forecasts |
